tool_description: An API with 3163 trivia questions with answers that are five letters in length
name: Trivia Questions
title: Trivia Questions

api_list.name: Trivia by ID
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a single response for the API by the ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trivia-questions.p.rapidapi.com/trivia/20"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivia-questions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trivia-questions.p.rapidapi.com/trivia/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivia-questions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Trivia
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all available trivia questions
